name: Twenty - Four
description:
Inspired by the works of Amnesia:The Dark Decent, and Machine for Pigs

Concept demo

-  aspects of mechanics, environment and story are subject to change

CONCEPT

It is the 24th of May 1841, just an ordinary day like any other. The sun was shining, birds were chirping, and so much more. But for Mr. Dan McCallister this was no ordinary day. You play as Dan, a paranormal investigator on the search for a missing town girl named Jane, she was kidnapped, taken into the woods. 

You go to look in the middle of the dense dark forest, then at the strike of midnight you stumble upon an old abandoned forest with engravings and shrines with the number "twenty four" embedded in them, only to find yourself hit in the back of the head with a blunt object knocking you out. You awake to a place you have never seen before, somewhere dark and eerie, could Jane still be alive? Am I the only one here? I sure hope so......

Features  - Stealth like gameplay. Your only choices to survive are to run, hide, or die  - First Person Game Mode for a more immersive feel  - Physics Based Puzzles and Standard Puzzles  - Story that will leave you wanting to know more!  - HD detailed environment thanks to Unreal Engine 4 - Surround Horror atmospheric sound track and SFX for an immersive feel 
Note, 

This was made by one 16 year old kid so the game will not be the most polished, as it is a concept demo. Full release of Chapter One will be fully polished and remove any bugs that may have been found. 

WARNING : 

Doesn't contain SFX for player footsteps / interactables in this early version of the game. All will be added in the full release of the game.
